values.value: Basket rigging and anchorages must be capable of supporting the weight of the gross lifted load plus the weight of the rigging equipment-including the gin pole. Bridle rigging must handle the horizontal forces of keeping the pole's vertical angle. All equipment must be ASME B30 compliant, in good condition and have Working Load Limits sufficient to hold all applied forces. ASME B30.9, ANSI A10.48 (11.5.7)
Is the gin pole bridle and basket rigging compliant and in good condition?
